text: Dennis Parnell Sullivan (born February 12, 1941) is an American mathematician. He is known for his work in algebraic topology, geometric topology, and dynamical systems. He is a professor at Stony Brook University. Sullivan won the Wolf Prize in Mathematics in 2010 and the Abel Prize in 2022. He won the Balzan Prize (2014). ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:Abel Prize winners Category:American mathematicians Category:Scientists from Michigan Category:Academics from New York City Category:Scientists from New York City
title: Dennis Sullivan
